name: Vanilla Cupcakes with Vanilla Whipped Cream Frosting
author: Pyure
summary: Pillows of billowy vanilla whipped cream top these sugar free cupcakes. Like little pieces of heaven, but sugar free!
ingredients: ½ cup Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend
½ teaspoon Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia Extract, vanilla flavor
¼ teaspoon Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia Extract, vanilla flavor
directions: Line 12 muffin cups with paper liners and spray liners with cooking spray, set aside
Beat together butter and Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend and Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia Blend, Vanilla Flavor until fluffy
Add eggs, one at a time blending after each addition
Whisk together flour, baking powder and salt
Beat into butter mixture, alternating with milk, making three additions of flour and two of milk, just until combined
Bake for 20 to 22 minutes or until tester inserted into center comes out clean
Let cool on rack for 10 minutes
Meanwhile, using a hand mixer, beat together cream and Pyure Organic Liquid Stevia Blend, Vanilla flavor until stiff peaks form
